musicalLanguage.description: Subtitled 'A Mexican Serenade,' Solace is one of Joplin's most beautiful and unusual works. It blends ragtime syncopation with a habanera-like rhythm, creating a wistful, swaying quality unlike any other rag.
musicalLanguage.structure: A section excerpt (8 bars) with habanera bass
teachingGoals: Develop smooth legato melody over rhythmic bass
styleTips: Play the melody expressively with gentle rubato
Left hand should have a gentle lilt, not a strict march
